channel.title: JavaScript on Sean Lane

item.title: Filtering domain names on Domcomp.com with regex
item.description: Lately, I’ve been looking around for another domain name that’s a little shorter and more flexible than seanlane.net. My purposes for that can be explained another time, but I have been trying to search domain names that have top-level domains (the .com part of google.com, for example) that are shorter in length, alongside some other attributes. There are a number of good tools to use for searching for available domain names, but I have not found any that allow for searching by the length of top-level domain.
